attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.  

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.  

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometres for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.

attributes.description:
With the spaciousness of a transporter and the compact manoeuvrability of a hatchback, KIA’s Rio is perfect for any energetic and adventurous driver!
Safety is a priority
The KIA Rio’s frame is made of a state-of-the-art structural steel composite, making the cabin much safer and even more secure. It is also equipped with up to six airbags to add to your peace of mind and guarantee greater protection in the event of a collision.
Intelligent performance coupled with stylish design
Comfort in technology
A chrome-accented centre console exudes style, while the conveniently designed steering wheel lets you stay in control of information and entertainment without taking your eyes off the road. The KIA Rio is equipped with not only a high-tech features, but also electric windows, so you can sit back and drive with the wind in your hair and your favourite songs playing through the Bluetooth.

attributes.description:
Stylish design and cutting-edge performance are just the beginning of your journey with the exciting Kia Sportage!
Turning heads left, right and centre
Tapering headlights show off the Sportage's aerodynamic capabilities like never before, giving you a car that is a stylish crowd pleaser. The distinctive horizontal rear lights offer maximum visibility for those driving behind you, while still encapsulating the Sportage’s signature sporty look.
Performance like never before
The KIA Sportage offers you all the functionality of an SUV with the style and performance of a sports car with a dynamic engine performances, the KIA Sportage drives smoothly and handles responsively. 
Adventure and interior comfort added with you in mind
